title: Lag spikes
body: I used to play at 34 ms all the time but recently, actually a week ago, i have been having spikes that go up to 2000 and then drop down slowly. I dont get disconnected i just stand there and I am unable to move nor see movements. In a competitive game I can't waste a second or 6 seconds just standing doing nothing. Please riot or someone if there is something I can do to help. I have been using the hextech repair tool.

replies.body:
Woooo boy that's a heck of a ping spike. Typically that kind of jump is caused by some kind of hiccup between your network and the game servers, but it could also be happening due to packet loss. Let's use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to see what exactly is going on when you get those spikes. 

Pop your latest game logs into that tool, and let me know what it says or shoot me a screenshot of it!
http://imgur.com/a/nKLbk I got two examples from my last games

So overall your packet loss wasn't too bad, but I did notice that in the first your packet loss got as high as 10% at one point. That small window of 10% packet loss could be what was causing that absurdly high ping. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to go more in depth about how you can get that ping situated.
